thread.title: In Copenhagen, an ambassador who is also a reality TV star
thread.title_full: Video: In Copenhagen, an ambassador who is also a reality TV star | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: In Copenhagen, an ambassador who is also a reality TV star
text: U.S. Ambassador to Copenhagen Rufus Gifford has an unusual side job: heâ€™s the star of his own reality TV show in Denmark. As special correspondent Malcolm Brabant reports, this, combined with his unique brand of diplomacy, is raising eyebrows among traditionalists.
